title: Legend of Zelda Minish Cap for NES Chinese pirate
description:
Another NES/Famicom oddity. Legend of Zedlda: The Minish Cap ported to the NES/Famicom by Chinese piraters. The game in action-


Runs fine in NEStopia, unsure of mapper requirements. The music is ripped from a GB Pokemon game and is annoying. Unlike any official Zelda game, this is a turn-based RPG with random battles. But it appears to follow the minish Cap plot.
